meanings.sent1: After the storm, they decided to repanel the damaged wall.
meanings.sent2: The carpenters will repanel the entire room with new wood.
meanings.sent3: The homeowner had to repanel the kitchen after the food fight.
meanings.sent4: She had to repanel her heart after the breakup left it shattered.
meanings.sent5: The artist carefully repanels the canvas to restore its original beauty.

meanings.sent1: The company will repanel the conference room for the upcoming meeting.

meanings.sent3: The robot had to repanel itself after the experiment went wrong.
meanings.sent4: The garden repanels itself with fresh blooms every spring.
meanings.sent5: The carpenter repanels the door with intricate designs.
